snake.translate: змея, змей, предатель, вероломный человек, змеиться, виться
examples: He was bitten by a snake.
The cobra is a venomous snake.
The snake cast off its old skin.
The snake reared its head.
The snake lifted its head and hissed.
A snake curled around his leg.
The snake slimed his victim.
The snake closed in for the kill.
The snake's poison causes paralysis.
the world's most deadly snake
The snake regenerated its tail.
the sibilant hiss of a snake
a coiled snake ready to strike
Theo prodded at the dead snake.
The snake crawled into its hole.
Slowly, the snake uncoiled.
Suck poison from a snake bite.
The snake coiled around its prey.
when Felix first saw a garter snake
The army snaked through the jungle.
The snake swallowed its prey whole.
The river snakes through the valley.
The snake's venom paralyzed the mouse.
The snake flicked its tongue in and out.
the forked tongue of a snake
A snake is a limbless reptile.
The snake was charmed by the music.
The snake curled up in the long grass.
The snake slithered through the garden.
The snake charmer fascinates the cobra.
example_translate: свернувшаяся в клубок змея, готовая напасть
когда Феликс впервые увидел садового ужа
Войска извилистыми тропами пробрались сквозь джунгли.
Змея высунула и мгновенно втянула обратно язык.
